name: HALF SIGHTED NINJA
description:
Made for the  GMTK 2019 Jam! Purely made with Javascript and HTML Canvases; this took a while. My sleep schedule is ruined and I don't know if I'll ever see my family again, but it was worth it to make this game. It's difficult but MUCH easier with audio enabled. 

Theme: Only one! You only get to see the level once before turning blind

Thanks for playing!
